CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 27 In chlorobenzene ( CB ) solution , PIDT - EHNT showed an absorption maximum at 599 nm and a slightly weaker peak at 433 nm ; when changing the branched 2ethylhexyl to linear hexyl side chain , the resulted polymer PIDT - DTNT showed a slightly bathochromic shift of two corresponding peaks to 608 and 439 nm , respectively , which may due to the reduced steric hindrance of the linear side chain.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| chlorobenzene |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| 2ethylhexyl |
| polymer PIDT - DTNT |
| linear hexyl side chain |

Note: I assumed that "PIDT" and "EHNT/DTNT" are abbreviations for some materials, and "2ethylhexyl" is a specific type of side chain. If these assumptions are incorrect, please let me know.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Based on your instructions, I have removed entities that do not clearly refer to "Material Name" and presented the valid entities as a Markdown table below:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| chlorobenzene |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| PIDT - DTNT |

Note: I have assumed that "PIDT" is a part of the material names "PIDT - EHNT" and "PIDT - DTNT". If this assumption is incorrect, please let me know.
